subtitleNullable: Identification of keywords - categorizing the news to different categories.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

The news may belong to one or more categories depending on the content of the news. For example, News about a sports personality may belong to the sports category and entertainment category too. There are certain entities/keywords in the news which can help in determining the category, the news belongs to.
All the URLs that are visited on TIL network belong to one/many categories. Given the set of URLs (maybe as URLs or ids), their short/long descriptions, participants have to classify them across multiple categories.

Reference: TechGig Code Gladiators 2020

### Content

What's inside is more than just rows and columns. Make it easy for others to get started by describing how you acquired the data and what time period it represents, too.


### Acknowledgements

We wouldn't be here without the help of others. If you owe any attributions or thanks, include them here along with any citations of past research.


### Inspiration

Your data will be in front of the world's largest data science community. What questions do you want to see answered?
